features: Thick Lather – Build a thick lather with or without a shaving brush
Classic Barbershop Scent – A refreshing scent that's a throwback to classic barbershop shaves
Water Based – Our water based shaving cream makes it easy to build a great lather
Made in Small Batches - Means a fresher shaving cream with fresher ingredients.
5 oz Tin – Convenient oversized 5oz tub for a shaving cream that lasts

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy A Smoother Shave Whether you use a shaving brush, or prefer to apply directly to your face, build a rich, thick and creamy lather with our Barbershop Shaving Cream.
Inspired by the Barbershop The barbershop is renowned for great stories, great people, and of course an incredible shaving experience. We took that same barbershop quality shave and brought it home.

Men's Grooming Inspired by Nature Smells Like Your Barbershop Features a cool, light, refreshing scent that's a throwback to classic barbershop shaves. Apply with Brush or Hands Our barbershop shaving cream is perfect for guys looking to up their shaving routine with a thick and creamy lather. You can use a shaving brush or apply directly to your face to quickly build a creamy and lush lather. Bring The Barbershop Home Shaving is a great time to do some thinking and get some much needed alone time. Treat yourself with our barbershop shaving cream by making it an addition to your daily shaving routine.

Crafted in Small Batches to Ensure Maximum Freshness And Quality We take product quality very seriously, which is why we create our shaving cream in small batches to ensure our products adhere to the highest level of quality. Our frequent production runs mean you receive a shaving cream that contains only the freshest ingredients.
Trusted & Used Daily by 200,000+ Men Rocky Mountain Barber products are trusted and used daily by professional and amateur athletes, outdoor adventurists and awesome people just like you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has a pleasant scent but not creamy enough to spread easily
reviews.reviewText: Unless it’s stale, it’s very hard in the jar and difficult to spread on your face

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best shaving cream I’ve ever used. So much better than drug store crap. No nicks whatsoever with my safety razor. I wish the tin were metal and not plastic so I could use it as a blade bank but really good stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding! I love this stuff!
reviews.reviewText: This shaving cream is fantastic! I use about a dime size of cream in a shave bowl. It whips up a real nice, rich lather in about 10-15 seconds with a wet shaving brush. I use it to shave my head, not my face. With only having to use such a small amount of cream, I expect to get 6+ months use out of this tin. As far as the scent goes, you only get the barbershop scent in the tin. After I whip up a lather and apply it to my head, I really don't smell the scent, but that doesn't take away that this is a fantastic shaving cream. I'll check out the sandalwood scent the next time I need to buy one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I started using this for past 2 years and would like to continue to use and recommend to others as well. The scent will last only during initial usage only. But overall I liked it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful product as well as customer service
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this product no more than a few days ago. At first I had an issue right off the bat. I had opened the container and there was a fairly decent amount of the product missing. I'm unsure if it was a leakage or if they intentionally leave large air bubbles within the product. Seeing the product is upwords of $16 per tin I felt cheated.I had emailed the company immediately through their business card that came with, and they've offered to replace it and I may keep the initial tin as a courtesy.Trying the product itself, I have quite sensitive skin. I almost dread going to the barbershop every two weeks because whatever product they use it ALWAYS irritates my skin. This has been a life-saver! I've had zero issues shaving with this brand of shaving cream, would 100% recommend it to my other sensitive skinned brothers and sisters. While having reduced product from the first tin as a negative, if customer service and quality remain this well; I have no issue staying a life-long consumer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looking Forward to V2.0
reviews.reviewText: This product would have gotten more stars were it not for the scent, or the lack thereof. Slickness and cushioning are pretty good. If you use your imagination, you can vaguely smell powder. If you really want that “old time barbershop” smell, try Mama Bear’s Old Time Barbershop. Growing up in an ethnic neighborhood in St. Louis, I remember that smell. It brings back nice memories, and Mama Bear got it spot on. Still, Rocky Mountain produces some good products, too. This one just needs a little work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This shaving cream is almost a barbershop scent. It does smell very fresh and a highly clean scent. Itcomes with the lid filled with the shaving cream, ( probably because of the shipping process ). Youcan spoon it back into the container. One thing is for certain, it will go a long way. I used a brushand a small amount on the end of the brush is well enough for a good shave.It stays moist and keeps your whiskers soft throughout the shave. Rinses clean and leaves your facewithout irritation. The only thing that I find that I am not satisfied with is, the price is a little muchfor a can of shaving cream. I imagined the can would be a little bigger. However, the descriptiondid mention the ounces. ( MY FAULT ). Other than that, it's a fine smelling and good shaving cream,for a comfortable shave...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This may be the best shaving cream i have ever used!!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been in the military for 23 years (and counting), so i shave almost daily. I prefer brush shaves, and over the years have tried multiple products, soaps, foams, gels, creams..etc, and i can say with confidence that this cream is the best i have ever used. I put a small amount on a damp brush( i am using the term damp lightly) and it was plenty, i could have shaved my face twice with the coverage a little bit produces. They also nail the the "barbershop scent" This will be my staple as long as i shave! I used it with a modern 5 bladed razor, but with the excellent sheerness and thickness, i will be dusting off my safety razor when i have time to enjoy the shave! I am hooked!

Sorry, Mountain shaving cream producers. I made a big mistake and will promote your unique, superior product. It is a very superior, unique product.My wife had used my razor for non razing whiskers ... sweaters, carpet and such. I wish to apologize to the Canadian maker of this fantastic shaving cream. A dap the size of a pea, a fresh blade on a warm face gives the best, smoothest shave and after skin conditioning I have ever felt.Thank you for your superior product. My face has never felt so great after a shave. Do not sell out this formula.

This creamy lather goes on effortlessly with a shaving brush and delivers a smooth, protective shave. I didn't like the soapy, almost detergenty smell at first, but it grew on me and the warm meringue it generates in a shaving bowl is sheer perfection.

I waited on this to do a proper test. I did a small review before but I could not mention everything.Did I mention the glide! No, i did not. This shaving cream makes the whiskers disappear! The razor glide over your face is fantastic. I just love this product. You have to commit to old fashioned shaving but hell, it is just wonderful. The women in the family love the scent. I have gotten used to it but it turns the girls on. It is definitely worth the price. The tin lasts forever. Get it and get a brush and do shaving right.
